wikipedia_page.main:
Ashley Beck is a Wales international rugby union player for the Worcester Warriors. A centre, he progressed through the Ospreys academy teams, making his debut for Aberavon RFC in the Welsh Premiership at age 17 in October 2007, scoring a try on that debut. He played 63 times for Aberavon before establishing himself in the Ospreys senior squad.In January 2012 Beck was called into the Wales 35 man senior squad for the training camp in Poland prior to the 2012 Six Nations Championship. He made his international debut on 9 June 2012 versus Australia in Brisbane as a second-half replacement.
On 13 February 2018, Beck quits Ospreys to join English club Worcester Warriors in the Aviva Premiership ahead of the 2018–19 season.
